alert.note: Alert for Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 10:23AM MST until January 03 at 2:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...Todd County and Tripp County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
